page.title: 10SHOPPING IN HIGHAM FERRERS
page.content:
Most people think that Higham Ferrers and Rushden have a good range of shops. Chelveston has only one general store.
Many of the shops in Higham Ferrers are centred on the High Street and Market Square. These are all very old buildings and so the frontages cannot be altered. This makes these shops very attractive to look at.
The shops include a supermarket, hardware store, chemists, food shops, a post office and several antique shops. There is also a cafe for people to relax in as they enjoy a refreshing drink.
The shopping area in Higham Ferrers is always busy, even though it only attracts local shoppers.
